greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle read by rows: T(n,k) is the number of series-reduced planted trees with n leaves and k internal nodes.
reference: J. Riordan, The blossoming of Schroeder's fourth problem, Acta Math., 137 (1976), 1-16.
link: Andrew Howroyd, Table of n, a(n) for n = 2..1276
formula: A001678(n) = Sum_{i=2..n-2} T(i, n-1-i) for n >= 3. - _Marko Riedel_, Mar 29 2021
program: EulerMT(u)={my(n=#u, p=x*Ser(u), vars=variables(p)); Vec(exp( sum(i=1, n, substvec(p + O(x*x^(n\i)), vars, apply(v->v^i,vars))/i ))-1)}
A(n)={my(v=vector(n)); v[1]=1; for(n=2, n, v[n]=y*EulerMT(v[1..n])[n]); apply(p -> Vecrev(p/y), v[2..n])}
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, May 29 2005
ext: Name clarified and terms a(38) and beyond from _Andrew Howroyd_, Sep 01 2018
